name: Neuro-sama V2
description:
LoRA model for the popular AI VTuber Neuro-sama of her new V2 appearance!

Support for default avatar + neko mode, with tags "neuro-sama" and "neurocat".

Works well with 0.4-0.7 strength. Low strength for off-model clothing, high strength for on model appearance.

Trained with NovelAI for compatibility with anime mixes

VTuber LoRA Rentry: https://rentry.org/t9ekk

Future update plan (v1.2): waiting on high quality screenshots of frog hood outfit + retrain LoRA so it's more stable at 1 strength

modelVersions.name: v1.1
modelVersions.description: revised training settings with DAdaptation, should look more like Neuro
